- **Lazy bundle trigger allocation** reducing memory usage by only allocating triggers when actually needed ([ocaml-multicore/picos#360](https://github.com/ocaml-multicore/picos/issues/360))
- **Enhanced load balancing** with periodic work stealing to improve fairness across worker threads ([ocaml-multicore/picos#358](https://github.com/ocaml-multicore/picos/issues/358))
- **Optimized bundle representation** through inlined atomic fields reducing memory footprint ([ocaml-multicore/picos#337](https://github.com/ocaml-multicore/picos/issues/337))
- **Benchmark configuration updates** prioritizing multififo scheduler in performance testing ([ocaml-multicore/picos#364](https://github.com/ocaml-multicore/picos/issues/364))
